import Head from '../../components/Head' import React, {useState} from 'react' import { useCurrentUser } from '../../lib/hooks'; const CreatePost=()=>{ const [errMsg, setErrMsg] = useState('') const [inputValue, setInputValue] = useState({image_link:'',caption:'', author:'',source:'', source_link:'', category:'', headings:''}) const [user] = useCurrentUser(); const handleInput = (e)=>{ const value = e.target.value; setInputValue({...inputValue, [e.target.name]:value}) } console.log(user) async function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault(); const body = { image_link: e.currentTarget.image_link.value, caption: e.currentTarget.caption.value, author: e.currentTarget.author.value, source: e.currentTarget.source.value, source_link: e.currentTarget.source_link.value, category: e.currentTarget.category.value, headings: e.currentTarget.headings.value, abstract_cat: e.currentTarget.abstract_cat.value, content: e.currentTarget.content.value, date: new Date() }; try{ const res = await fetch(`/api/posts`, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(body), }); if(res.status==200||res.status==201){setErrMsg("posted successfully")} } catch(err){ setErrMsg("An error occured, pls check your internet connection and try again") } // revalidate the `post-pages` key in usePostPages //revalidate(); // Perhaps show a dialog box informing the post has been posted } return(

NEWS POST

{errMsg &&
{errMsg}
}
) } export default CreatePost
